mapper.select: select s.id,s.version,t.src_db,t.src_table,t.dbname,t.table_name,s.create_time,s.schema,s.spark_schema,t.table_type from tb_table_schema s, tb_import_tables t where s.table_id=t.id and t.id = #{table_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by s.id desc limit #{fromRowId,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from tb_table_schema s, tb_import_tables t where s.table_id=t.id and t.id = #{table_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_table_schema
id,
table_id,
version,
create_time,
update_time,
schema,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{table_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{schema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_table_schema
table_id = #{table_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
schema = #{schema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_table_schema set table_id = #{table_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, schema = #{schema,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
